keyPolicies.policyDescription: Opposition to another Scottish independence referendum. The candidate urges to vote for the Scottish Conservative and Unionist Party to make Nicola Sturgeon listen and stop the threat of another independence referendum.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Labour and the Lib Dems are described as too weak to beat the SNP in the constituency of Airdrie and Shotts. A tactical voting consideration is suggested, pointing to the increase in the Conservative vote at the 2017 General Election and the decrease in SNP vote.

quotes.text: CORBYN ACCUSED OF PLOT TO BREAK UP BRITAIN
...the Labour leader admitted he could grant a referendum if he was to win the General Election.
Corbyn could back new indyref 'as early as 2021'

images.caption: Lorraine Nolan campaign leaflet with information about the Scottish Conservative and Unionist Party's stance on the Scottish independence referendum and the political situation in Airdrie and Shotts.
